channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Taiwan's Wild Goats Threatened by Parasitic Disease
item.description: A parasitic disease has been spreading through Taiwan's Formosan serow up in the countryâ€™s mountains.

item.title: Taiwanese Canoe Sprinter Joins 2024 Olympics, First for the Nation
item.description: Lai Kuan-chieh has become the first canoe paddler in Taiwan's history to qualify for the Olympics after winning a gold and a silver in recent international competitions.

item.title: President Tsai Hopes for Greater Taiwan-U.S. Cooperation
item.description: President Tsai Ing-wen is hoping for greater cooperation between Taiwan and the United States as she meets with a delegation from a Washington-based think tank.

item.title: High Temperatures Burn Away 80% of Taiwan's Honey Harvest
item.description: Climate change has caused a sharp drop in Taiwan's honey harvests. Miaoli's beekeepers say honey production has dropped to 20% of a typical year.
